bioghist.p: Desmond Meiring is a writer and former oil executive in the Middle East, Asia, and South America. He is the author of The Brinkman (1964), The Man with No Shadow (1962), and A Talk with the Angels (1985), among other works.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of carbon copies of manuscripts by Meiring, including Wall of Glass, The Brinkman, A Square Called Silence, and Dasturi. The collection also includes a letter to a publisher about publishing Wall of Glass.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
